Address.value: 300 CRESCENT COURT,SUITE 700, DALLAS, Texas, 75201, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: NexPoint Real Estate Finance Inc is a real estate investment trust. It provides structured financing solutions by investing in mid-sized multifamily, storage and select-service, and extended-stay hospitality properties. Its investment objective is to generate attractive, risk-adjusted returns for stockholders over the long term.
